name: Cloudy With A Chance Of Fireballs
name_original: Cloudy With A Chance Of Fireballs
description:
Cloudy With A Chance Of Fireballs is a random spell generator for roleplaying soft-magick-ish OSR games.

Spell: Soul of Silas

The wise caster of this major magick may bring forth a deceiving soul. This spell can affect an area the size of a barn and it can hit a target as far as a cat leaps. The damage this spell wreaks is enough to permanently scar any who survive it. The spell's effects last until a child is born.

Cloudy With A Chance Of Fireballs randomly generates text like the sample above to immerse you in a world of old magicks, weird wizards, and wild effects found mostly in scrolls.

In addition to spell name, area of effect, range, damage, and duration, this generator also provides the ritual required to cast the spell, the ritual required to recharge it, and an arcane catastrophe that can strike should the caster fail in any way.

For those who wish to see a quick summary of the spell, a table is provided in addition to the flavour text.

The game is built in HTML and designed to run on any device and screen size.
